import React, { useState } from 'react'; import WithServer from '../hoc'; import './create-post-form.css' const CreatePostForm = () => { const [title, setTitle] = useState('') const [description, setDescription] = useState('') const [fullText, setFullText] = useState('') return (
console.log(title, description, fullText)}>
setTitle(e.target.value)} />
setDescription(e.target.value)} />
) } export default WithServer()(CreatePostForm);
